content.text:
# Draft:Brill'King

----
Brill'king is a South African Musician.Born on 30 October 1991 in Schoemansdal,Mpumalanga ,south Africa.He stared his Music career is 2023 release his first song 'Ungowam' and followed up with 'Ngiyazisola' in 2024.His music is a fussion of AfroPop , RNB and Afribeats.
